name: Kombucha Home Brewing Starter Kit | 5-Inch Large Scoby Kombucha Starter Kit | Complete Kit Includes What You Need w/ 16 oz Starter Tea, Brewing Jar & Brewing Supplies | Brew Unlimited Kombucha
short_description: ULTIMATE KOMBUCHA STARTER KIT – Our kit includes a 5-inch Scoby kombucha starter, starter tea, loose-leaf tea blend, cane sugar, a brewing jar with cloth cover, acid-range pH test strip, adhesive temperature strip, and detailed instructions.

KOMBUCHA BREWING MADE EASY – The Kombucha Company makes producing kombucha a no-brainer. Our Complete Kombucha Brewing Starter Kit includes a 6-page kombucha brewing guide and everything you need to brew your own kombucha at home.

KOMBUCHA FOR LIFE – Make an unlimited supply of kombucha drinks with our home brewing kit. With our extra-large Scoby kombucha starter and starter tea, you can make batch after batch of this probiotic-rich drink.
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS – Our kombucha starter kit contian loose-leaf tea blend and sugar. We made sure that they do not contain artificial additives and chemicals.

GOOD FOR THE GUT – Kombucha is a naturally fermented drink that helps support digestion and immunity because it’s rich in antioxidants and probiotics. Replace your soda with this low sugar fizzy drink for better overall wellness.

name: Kombucha Starter Kit – Includes Organic SCOBY, Starter Liquid, 1 Gallon Glass Jar, Temp Gauge, Tea, and Sugar
short_description: EASY TO MAKE – Easily Brew Your First Batch of Kombucha: Kit comes with organic SCOBY and starter liquid, 1 gallon glass brew jar, breathable brew jar cover, adhesive temperature gauge, organic tea blend, organic sugar, reusable tea bag and easy-to-follow instructions.

FOR KOMBUCHA LOVERS: Create your own homemade kombucha and save money making this delicious drink at home. Kombucha is low in sugar, good for your gut health and digestion, and has been known to help people lose weight. This kit is ideal for first-time kombucha brewers and people wanting to enjoy a healthier lifestyle. Makes the perfect gift.

QUALITY, VALUE & COST-EFFECTIVE: We don't cut corners. This kombucha kit contains all of the essential components like a jar, tea, sugar and a SCOBY. The glass jar has a wide mouth and is made with thick-walled glass. The organic tea is loose leaf and high quality to give your kombucha brew a rich, smooth flavor. Includes cane sugar (not white sugar) for a better fermentation.

MAKES 1 GALLON TO START, THEN MANY MORE: After your first brew is complete, save 1 cup of starter liquid per 1-gallon of kombucha, plus that gorgeous SCOBY and continue the endless cycle of fermenting your own kombucha at home.

GUARANTEED TO BREW: 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. Our SCOBYs are USDA Certified Organic, are grown with a proprietary blend of organic tea, organic cane sugar, triple filtered water and mature starter liquid, have been lab tested and contain thousands of strains of healthy bacteria and yeast essential to making of kombucha.

name: Kombucha Heating Wrap - Fermentation Heater Mat Pad with Temperature Control
short_description: North American 120V only - Made specifically for kombucha - this kombucha heating mat is designed specifically for home brewing kombucha by a kombucha brewer. It's sized to fit 1-gallon brewing vessels.

3 temperature settings - most other heating wraps set the temperature too high or too low. I've picked each temperature setting so you can be confident you are brewing at the right temperature year round. Just set according to the season and your preferences and forget!
Safe to use around liquids - this heating pad is safe to use around kombucha. No more worrying about spilling.

Designed to work with temperature gauges - I hated having to remove my kombucha wrap to check the temperatures. This mat leaves enough room so you can see your temperature strip without having to remove the heater.
Designed to be used for the entire brewing process - this heating wrap can be left on for the entire brewing cycle.

name: Cultures for Health Certified Organic Kombucha Starter SCOBY | Heirloom Culture for Unlimited Batches | Shelf-Stable Dehydrated Scoby for Fresh Activation | Brew Your Own Probiotic Tea | pH Test Strips Included
short_description: CERTIFIED ORGANIC & HEIRLOOM QUALITY: Start your brew with the best. Our SCOBY (Symbiotic Culture of Bacteria and Yeast) is now Certified Organic and a true heirloom culture. Unlike short-lived alternatives, our starter is descended from a traditional lineage, ensuring a vigorous, balanced, and authentic kombucha brew every single time. Proudly non-GMO and packed in the USA.

BREW UNLIMITED KOMBUCHA & SAVE: Why buy a new SCOBY for every few brews? Our single heirloom culture is self-propagating, empowering you to brew limitless batches of delicious, probiotic-rich kombucha for life. Stop paying $4+ per bottle at the store and enjoy a lifetime supply of healthy, fizzy fermented tea for the one-time cost of this starter kit.

SHELF-STABLE FOR FRESHNESS & CONVENIENCE: Our dehydrated SCOBY is shelf-stable and delivered in a dormant state, protecting the living probiotics during shipping. This means you can start brewing on your schedule, not ours. Upon activation, it awakens into a powerful, fresh culture ready to ferment your sweet tea into a tangy, healthy kombucha drink.

BREW WITH CONFIDENCE | pH STRIPS INCLUDED: Take the guesswork out of fermenting! We are the only starter that includes a vile of pH test strips in every kit. This essential tool helps you monitor your brew's acidity, ensuring a safe, successful, and perfectly tangy fermentation from your very first batch. Combined with our clear, step-by-step instructions, you'll be brewing like a pro in no time.

THE CULTURES FOR HEALTH PROMISE: As one of the most trusted names in home fermentation, we are committed to your success. Our kit is dairy-free, gluten-free, and vegan. If you have questions, our team of fermentation experts is ready to help you on your journey. Choose Cultures for Health for a high-quality, complete, and fully supported brewing experience.
